sentences.sContent: “The modeling of methane hydrate is frankly in its infancy,” but it seems “robust to conclude” that mankind could “melt a significant fraction of the methane hydrates in the ocean,” they wrote.
sentences.sContent_eng: “The modeling of methane hydrate is frankly in its infancy,” but it seems “robust to conclude” that mankind could “melt a significant fraction of the methane hydrates in the ocean,” they wrote.
sentences.sCn: “坦率地说，甲烷水合物的建模工作尚处于起步阶段，”但它似乎“得出了有力的结论”，即人类的活动可能会“融化海洋中相当一部分的甲烷水合物，”他们这样写道。

phrases.pCn: 气体水合物，天然气水合物
水合氯醛；水合三氯乙醛
消石灰；熟石灰（等于slaked lime）

words.tran: 与水化合；成水合物（hydrate的过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: a chemical substance that contains water
